verses.verse: And in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> strengthened <S%H2388><s%> himself, and took <S%H3947><s%> the captains <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds <S%H3967><s%>, Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham <S%H3395><s%>, and Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehohanan <S%H3076><s%>, and Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Obed <S%H5744><s%>, and Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adaiah <S%H5718><s%>, and Elishaphat <S%H478><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zichri <S%H2147><s%>, into covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him.

And they went about <S%H5437><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and gathered <S%H6908><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> out of all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and they came <S%H935><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And all the congregation <S%H6951><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the king <S%H4428><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Behold, the king's <S%H4428><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> shall reign <S%H4427><s%>, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath said <S%H1696><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>.

This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> that ye shall do <S%H6213><s%>; A third part <S%H7992><s%> of you entering <S%H935><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, of the priests <S%H3548><s%> and of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, shall be porters <S%H7778><s%> of the doors <S%H5592><s%>;

And a third part <S%H7992><s%> shall be at the king's <S%H4428><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>; and a third part <S%H7992><s%> at the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the foundation <S%H3247><s%>: and all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall be in the courts <S%H2691><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

But let none come <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, save the priests <S%H3548><s%>, and they that minister <S%H8334><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>; they shall go in <S%H935><s%>, for they are holy <S%H6944><s%>: but all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the watch <S%H4931><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall compass <S%H5362><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> with his weapons <S%H3627><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>; and whosoever else cometh <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%>, he shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%>: but be ye with the king <S%H4428><s%> when he cometh in <S%H935><s%>, and when he goeth out <S%H3318><s%>.

So the Levites <S%H3881><s%> and all Judah <S%H3063><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to all things that Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his men <S%H582><s%> that were to come in <S%H935><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, with them that were to go <S%H3318><s%> out on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>: for Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> dismissed <S%H6358><s%> not the courses <S%H4256><s%>.

Moreover Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> to the captains <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds <S%H3967><s%> spears <S%H2595><s%>, and bucklers <S%H4043><s%>, and shields <S%H7982><s%>, that had been king <S%H4428><s%> David's <S%H1732><s%>, which were in the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.

And he set <S%H5975><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> having his weapon <S%H7973><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>, from the right <S%H3233><s%> side <S%H3802><s%> of the temple <S%H1004><s%> to the left <S%H8042><s%> side <S%H3802><s%> of the temple <S%H1004><s%>, along by the altar <S%H4196><s%> and the temple <S%H1004><s%>, by the king <S%H4428><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

Then they brought out <S%H3318><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> upon him the crown <S%H5145><s%>, and gave him the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, and made him king <S%H4427><s%>. And Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%>, God save <S%H2421><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>.

¶ Now when Athaliah <S%H6271><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> running <S%H7323><s%> and praising <S%H1984><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, she came <S%H935><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>:

And she looked <S%H7200><s%>, and, behold, the king <S%H4428><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> at his pillar <S%H5982><s%> at the entering in <S%H3996><s%>, and the princes <S%H8269><s%> and the trumpets <S%H2689><s%> by the king <S%H4428><s%>: and all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> rejoiced <S%H8056><s%>, and sounded <S%H8628><s%> with trumpets <S%H2689><s%>, also the singers <S%H7891><s%> with instruments <S%H3627><s%> of musick <S%H7892><s%>, and such as taught <S%H3045><s%> to sing praise <S%H1984><s%>. Then Athaliah <S%H6271><s%> rent <S%H7167><s%> her clothes <S%H899><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Treason <S%H7195><s%>, Treason <S%H7195><s%>.

Then Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> brought out <S%H3318><s%> the captains <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds <S%H3967><s%> that were set over <S%H6485><s%> the host <S%H2428><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Have her forth <S%H3318><s%> of the ranges <S%H1004><s%> <S%H7713><s%>: and whoso followeth <S%H935><s%> <S%H310><s%> her, let him be slain <S%H4191><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>. For the priest <S%H3548><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Slay <S%H4191><s%> her not in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

So they laid <S%H7760><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> on her; and when she was come <S%H935><s%> to the entering <S%H3996><s%> of the horse <S%H5483><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> by the king's <S%H4428><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, they slew <S%H4191><s%> her there.

¶ And Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> between him, and between all the people <S%H5971><s%>, and between the king <S%H4428><s%>, that they should be the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>.

Then all the people <S%H5971><s%> went <S%H935><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%>, and brake it down <S%H5422><s%>, and brake <S%H7665><s%> his altars <S%H4196><s%> and his images <S%H6754><s%> in pieces <S%H7665><s%>, and slew <S%H2026><s%> Mattan <S%H4977><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altars <S%H4196><s%>.

Also Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> appointed <S%H7760><s%> the offices <S%H6486><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, whom David <S%H1732><s%> had distributed <S%H2505><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, to offer <S%H5927><s%> the burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, as it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, with rejoicing <S%H8057><s%> and with singing <S%H7892><s%>, as it was ordained by <S%H3027><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>.

And he set <S%H5975><s%> the porters <S%H7778><s%> at the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that none which was unclean <S%H2931><s%> in any thing <S%H1697><s%> should enter in <S%H935><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> the captains <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds <S%H3967><s%>, and the nobles <S%H117><s%>, and the governors <S%H4910><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, and brought down <S%H3381><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: and they came <S%H935><s%> through <S%H8432><s%> the high <S%H5945><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> into the king's <S%H4428><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and set <S%H3427><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> upon the throne <S%H3678><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4467><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> rejoiced <S%H8055><s%>: and the city <S%H5892><s%> was quiet <S%H8252><s%>, after that they had slain <S%H4191><s%> Athaliah <S%H6271><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>.
